Reviews.Content: family hawaiian inn mid february daughters wedding tell absolutely wonderful 5 due various owners bride grooms sooo wrong immediately fixed giving choices clean stay wonderful yes remodeling ok gorgeous price view wonderful staffi cant highly recommend hawaiian inn definitely months especially thank michel marissa special people luau fantastic loved
